statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND location='New York';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'favorite_color'='Blue';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'category' = 'Sports' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, location FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, age, location FROM customers
SELECT last_name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND preference='Sweets';
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, budget, start_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_customer LIKE '%VIP%' ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE postal_code = '12345'
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE age <= 25
SELECT * FROM Demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT favorite_brand, favorite_product FROM Preferences WHERE discount_code IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND postal_code <> '12345'

SELECT Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name, Demographics.gender, Demographics.income FROM Customers JOIN Demographics ON Customers.id = Demographics.customer_id WHERE Demographics.income > 50000
SELECT * FROM Customers INNER JOIN Preferences ON Customers.id = Preferences.customer_id WHERE Preferences.favorite_brand = 'Nike' AND Customers.age < 40
SELECT Customers.id, Customers.first_name, Preferences.favorite_product FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Preferences ON Customers.id = Preferences.customer_id WHERE Preferences.discount_code IS NULL
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_type = 'Food';
SELECT segment_name, target_age_group, target_gender, target_location FROM MarketingSegments WHERE segment_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT c.customer_id, s.segment_name FROM SegmentCustomerMapping scm JOIN CustomerDemographics c ON scm.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN MarketingSegments s ON scm.segment_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, target_age_group FROM MarketingSegments WHERE target_gender = 'Female';

SELECT cd.customer_id, cs.segment_name FROM CustomerDemographics cd JOIN SegmentCustomerMapping scm ON cd.customer_id = scm.customer_id JOIN MarketingSegments cs ON scm.segment_id = cs.segment_id ORDER BY cd.customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, last_purchase_date FROM preferences WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT demographic_id, region, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 AND ethnicity = 'Hispanic' ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_color FROM preferences WHERE subscription_status = TRUE AND last_purchase_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT segment_name, target_region, target_age_group FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY segment_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_history WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
